questions.question_text: What is a benefit of data quality and transparency as it pertains to bias in generative AI?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Chances of bias are mitigated

Selected Answer: C
C. Chances of bias are mitigated

Selected Answer: C
It helps to mitigate the bias, but the possibility of having bias is always present.

Selected Answer: C
C - data quality helps to manage and maintain bias

Selected Answer: C
C. Chances of bias are mitigated.

choices.C: Generative AI creates new content based on existing data and predictive AI analyzes existing data.
choices.B: Generative AI finds content similar to existing data and predictive AI analyzes existing data.
choices.A: Generative AI analyzes existing data and predictive AI creates new content based on existing data.

questions.question_text: What is the key difference between generative and predictive AI?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Generative AI creates new content based on existing data and predictive AI analyzes existing data.

choices.B: AI predictions become more focused and less robust.
choices.C: Biases in data can be inadvertently learned and amplified by AI systems.
choices.A: AI models maintain accuracy but have slower response times.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Biases in data can be inadvertently learned and amplified by AI systems.

questions.question_text: What is a possible outcome of poor data quality?

A Salesforce administrator creates a new field to capture an order's destination country.

Which field type should they use to ensure data quality?

choices.C: AI infringes on privacy when user consent is not obtained.
choices.B: AI operates independently of user privacy and consent.
choices.A: AI ensures complete data privacy by automatically obtaining user consent.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. AI infringes on privacy when user consent is not obtained.

questions.question_text: What is an implication of user consent in regard to AI data privacy?
